TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的 、、 和 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , and events of the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 中使用类， ， ，和方法以提供访问输出参数、 返回值和由调用的方法引发的异常控件。The class is used in the , , , and methods to provide access to output parameters, return values, and exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control. 这些通过， ，和属性，分别。These are accessed by the , , and properties, respectively. 通过添加一个委托来处理， ， ，或事件，你可以检查此数据并执行是必需的任何其他的后续处理。By adding a delegate to handle the , , , or events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing that is required. 控件可公开可以处理在其生命周期的各个时间用于基础业务对象的多个事件。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its lifecycle. 下表列出了事件以及关联类和事件处理程序委托。The following table lists the events and the associated classes and event handler delegates. |事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|EventHandlerEventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |。.

创建业务对象的实例之前立即发生。Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

创建业务对象的实例后立即发生。Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.||| |。.

检索的数据之前发生。Occurs before the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

执行插入、 更新或删除操作之前发生。Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |。.

检索的数据后发生。Occurs after the data is retrieved.||| |、 和 。, , and .

完成插入、 更新或删除操作后执行。Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.||| |。.

在业务对象被销毁前发生。Occurs before a business object is destroyed.||| ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件中删除数据。The first code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例使用示例中间层业务对象。The second code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the first code example uses. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`、控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果你单击**删除**按钮，使用由指定的方法执行操作属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，一个参数中指定与员工 ID 相对应的集合In this code example, one parameter is specified in the collection that corresponds to the employee ID. 这是因为尽管 ID 包含在集合作为对象，它将作为连接到的字符串传递控件。This is because although the ID is included in the collection as a object, it will be passed as a string to the control. 通过将它添加到显式具有集合属性设置为值，它将通过正确通过到方法为一个整数，而不是字符串。By adding it explicitly to the collection with a property set to the value, it will pass correctly by the to the method as an integer, rather than as string. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理之前的事件执行操作，则与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理事件之后操作完成后，若要处理它的任何可能发生的异常。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托访问可能由正在使用的业务对象引发的异常对象。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate accesses possible exceptions that are thrown by the business object that is using the object. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理此委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by this delegate. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用示例中间层业务对象。The following code example provides an example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses. 以下列表描述中的代码示例定义两个主要类：The following list describes the two major classes that are defined in the code example: - `EmployeeLogic`类是不维护状态，并封装业务逻辑的类。The `EmployeeLogic` class is a class that does not maintain state and encapsulates business logic. - `NorthwindEmployee`类是一个包含仅需加载和保持数据从数据层的基本功能的模型类。The `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier. 此外，`NorthwindDataException`类提供为方便起见。In addition, a `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience. 这组示例类使用 Northwind Traders 数据库，这是一个可用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 的示例数据库。This set of example classes uses the Northwind Traders database, which is an example database that is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access. 有关完整的工作示例，你必须编译为一个库，此代码，然后使用这些类 ASP 页面中。For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library, and then use these classes from an ASP page. 前面的示例中提供了 ASP 页面已配置为使用此类库。The ASP page that is provided in the preceding example is configured to work with this class library. `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你将不将数据插入 Northwind Traders 数据库时使用此示例进行试验。The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/northwindemployee10.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/northwindemployee10.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的输出参数和返回值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified output parameters and return value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue`参数可以是对业务对象数据方法的调用返回任何对象。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters`参数是与方法签名中匹配和通过引用传递的名称/值对的集合。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.

MemberSignature.Value: public ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs (object returnValue, System.Collections.IDictionary outputParameters, Exception exception);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object returnValue, class System.Collections.IDictionary outputParameters, class System.Exception exception) cil managed
public: ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs(System::Object ^ returnValue, System::Collections::IDictionary ^ outputParameters, Exception ^ exception);

param.name: returnValue
param.span: 一个表示已完成的数据库操作的返回值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents a return value for the completed database operation.

param.name: outputParameters
param.span: Parameter 对象的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs of parameter objects.

param.name: exception
param.span: 一个 ，包装在方法调用期间引发的任何内部异常。

span.span: An that wraps any internal exceptions thrown during the method call.

summary.span: 使用指定的输出参数、返回值和异常初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified output parameters, return value, and exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `returnValue`参数可以是对业务对象数据方法的调用返回任何对象。The `returnValue` parameter can be any object that is returned by a call to the business object data method. `outputParameters`参数是与方法签名中匹配和通过引用传递的名称/值对的集合。The `outputParameters` parameter is an collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference. `exception`参数是包装由调用的方法引发任何异常的异常数据操作过程中的控件。The `exception` parameter is an exception that wraps any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation. 如果未处理异常， ， ，或方法，通过将引发后返回的数据操作进行控制。If the exception is not handled by an , , , or method, it is thrown by the control after the data operation returns.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int AffectedRows { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置受数据操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows that are affected by the data operation.

value.span: 受数据操作影响的行的数目。

span.span: The number of rows affected by the data operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用值来验证预期的行数是否受到影响。Use the value to verify that the expected number of rows was affected.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Exception As Exception
public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取在数据操作期间由 控件调用的方法所引发的任何异常的包装。

span.span: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions that are thrown by the method that is called by the control during a data operation.

value.span: 一个 ，将业务对象引发的任何异常包装到其 内。

span.span: An that wraps any exceptions thrown by the business object in its .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常不表示实际业务对象数据方法引发的异常。The exception does not represent the actual exception that is thrown by the business object data method. 你可以使用属性来访问所引发的异常。You can use the property to access the thrown exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`、控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果你单击**删除**按钮，使用由指定的方法执行操作属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理之前的事件执行操作，则与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理事件之后操作完成后，执行任何异常处理。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to perform any exception handling. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要检查的`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象使用此代码示例，请参阅中的类概述。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示业务对象引发的异常是否已得到处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was thrown by the business object has been handled.

value.span: 如果业务对象引发的异常已得到处理并且不应由 引发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an exception thrown by the business object has been handled and should not be thrown by the ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果业务对象引发异常，属性设置为`false`和异常由包装属性。If the business object throws an exception, the property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the property. 如果你使用对象，你可以检查属性并处理该异常。If you use an object, you can check the property and handle the exception. 如果处理异常，设置属性`true`或控件将引发异常。If you handle the exception, set the property to `true` or the control will throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用业务对象使用的控件和控件中删除数据。The following code example demonstrates how to use an control with a business object and a control to delete data. 最初显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。The initially displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object. 因为属性设置为`true`、控件自动显示**删除**按钮。Because the property is set to `true`, the control automatically displays a **Delete** button. 如果你单击**删除**按钮，使用由指定的方法执行操作属性和中指定任何参数集合。If you click the **Delete** button, the action is performed using the method that is specified by the property and any parameters that are specified in the collection. 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed. `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理之前的事件执行操作，则与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理事件之后操作完成后，若要处理它的任何可能发生的异常。The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the event before the action is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the event after the action has completed, to handle any exceptions that might have occurred. 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`委托。In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate. 若要检查的`EmployeeLogic`中间层业务对象使用此代码示例，请参阅中的类概述。To examine the implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier business object that this code example uses, see the class overview in . [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/CS/objds10cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_10/VB/objds10vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputParameters As IDictionary
public: property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ OutputParameters { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含业务对象方法参数及其值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.

value.span: 表示业务对象方法参数及其相应值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过引用传递到业务对象方法的任何参数中返回集合。Any parameters that are passed to the business object method by reference are returned in the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ReturnValue As Object
public: property System::Object ^ ReturnValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取由业务对象方法（如果有）作为对象返回的返回值。

span.span: Gets the return value that is returned by the business object method, if any, as an object.

value.span: 一个对象，表示由业务对象方法返回的返回值；否则为 （如果该业务对象不返回值）。

span.span: An object that represents the return value returned by the business object method; otherwise, , if the business object method returns no value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在中设置构造函数。The property is set in the constructor. 值设置为业务对象方法调用的说明进行操作，它使用反射调用的返回值。The value is set to the return value of the business object method call, which is called using reflection. 如果业务方法不返回值 (如业务对象方法返回时`void`)，则属性计算结果为`null`。If the business method returns no value (such as when the business object method returns `void`), the property evaluated to `null`.
